explanation: [0-0] Two people are sitting at a table in a room. The brown-haired man on the left is wearing white clothes and has a beard, while the brown-haired woman on the right is wearing a gray top and a green jacket. There is a small white cat on the table. Behind them is a white wall and window, with purple lights flashing in the corner.

[0-7] The man in white is stroking the cat when suddenly he thinks of something and turns to leave. The brown-haired woman looks at him while holding the cat. The scene cuts to the man in white bringing two ice creams to the table. The brown-haired woman and the cat look at the ice cream happily. Then, the camera zooms in, and the brown-haired woman frowns at the man, seemingly asking why there are only two. The man shrugs helplessly.
